column1: It’s not just a matter of deserve. #Taiwan’s response & contributions to global public health during #COVID19 has proven that Taiwan’s participation in global health frameworks like #WHA is essential to fighting dangerous disease outbreaks. https://t.co/b3lZV3J2NZ

#Taiwan has more than earned its place in the #WHA with its contributions to global public health & work to save lives during the #COVID19 #pandemic. The time to restore Taiwan’s observer status is now. @HouseForeignGOP https://t.co/sSPL5MxlMd

Great move by @USAID w/US investment in #CEPI. Global disease outbreaks require global responses & the US has an essential role to play in international vaccine development efforts especially on #COVID__19. https://t.co/kUbnPPm1M6

#COVID19 is challenging the progress of @FeedtheFuture. @UF's @Livestock_Lab Dr. Adesogan is doing great work to ensure food aid & nutrition assistance are reaching those in greatest need.  @UF_IFAS @FSI_UF_IFAS @uf_ansci  @ILRI @USAID @gatesfoundation https://t.co/Ug8UVHz3Bo
This unprecedented crisis has exposed our longstanding supply chain issues & the DFC’s investments will be valuable for our critical infrastructure moving forward.  #coronavirus
Thank you @realDonaldTrump for your action to focus the Development Finance Corporation (DFC) on improving domestic supply chains in response to the #COVID19 pandemic.

Grateful to the people of #Taiwan for their generous gift of 10K medical masks to help keep #Putnam Co. safe. The global health partnership between the U.S. & #Taiwan is strong. #PPE #COVID__19 https://t.co/X5qQEEnvNc

This is exactly the kind of engagement we need after all of #Taiwan’s contributions to #globalhealth #security especially in fighting #COVID19 & generously donating hundreds of thousands of masks to the US. https://t.co/ZjQG3QzjAs

#China’s actions towards #India fall in line with a larger trend of the #ChineseCommunistParty using the confusion of the #COVID19 #pandemic as cover to launch large scale military provocations against its neighbors in the region including #HongKong #Taiwan & #Vietnam.

New revelation in the report that #China FAILED to notify the #WHO about #COVID19 through December and was notified by early warning reports from the US. Yet @WHO still protects the #CCP & allows them to continue to spread their propaganda campaign.

As suspected this report confirms that the #CCP engaged in a massive coverup to hide the origins of the #COVID19 #pandemic & ignored International Health Regulations all of which were enabled by the @WHO. https://t.co/ElVUA1mPQZ

Happy to join @RepSusanWild in leading a letter to increase funding to fight #COVID19 internationally. By helping other nations fight #coronavirus we help ourselves through access to international vaccine development & research into testing & treatment. https://t.co/EIZyOnnOJS

ICYMI I had an informative discussion w/ @cspanwj @cspanMcArdle about U.S. relations with #China during the #Covid_19 #pandemic & tensions regarding #HongKong.     Watch the full interview: https://t.co/fkcsWZLZI1
When analyzing #China's face-mask diplomacy facts are stubborn things.  #Covid_19 #coronavirus https://t.co/Phniwi6o6o
From supply chain disruptions to decreased demand few have felt the effects of the #coronavirus pandemic worse than our nation’s #farmers. @HouseAgGOP @HouseGOP #agriculture
I applaud @realDonaldTrump for mobilizing the U.S. International Development Finance Corporation to help rescue American businesses & consumers. https://t.co/LiTwakWBm1 #coronavirus @HouseGOP

#China shows its true colors using the devastation wrought by #COVIDー19 as cover for its militaristic actions & ambitions. #Taiwan is a sovereign nation & the Taiwan strait is no place to be conducting two straight months of antagonistic live-fire drills. https://t.co/TwYD7Vhtli

After all the negligence & coverups on the part of the #CCP #China resorts to its usual tactics of #intellectualproperty theft to steal vaccine development research. https://t.co/QPCc5walKj  #coronavirus  @HouseGOP

Grateful for the millions of nurses across the country tirelessly caring for the sick and saving lives. Thank you all for your selfless sacrifice empathy and heroic work in the fight to defeat #Covid_19.   #NationalNursesDay #NursesWeek https://t.co/GlR8ctqiAI

#DHS intel report confirms “#China held off informing [WHO] the #coronavirus was a contagion most of January” so it could hoard medical supplies from abroad. Then they send faulty & broken medical supply shipments to countries in need in a so-called “politics of generosity”

Let this be a watershed moment for our nation as a mistake to never repeat. With countless human lives and livelihoods at stake the time for gambling with #globalhealth security is done. #USGlobalResponse #COVID19
We must continue to think aggressively and plan for the long term while supporting international public-private partnerships like #GAVI and #CEPI. #USGlobalResponse #COVID19

The United States and the rest of the world cannot afford to relinquish authority over #globalhealth security or to isolate ourselves from protecting the wellbeing of other nations. #USGlobalResponse #COVID19

Honored to join my colleague @RepBera in leading a bipartisan virtual Special Order to highlight the importance of U.S. global leadership in the fight against #COVID19. #USGlobalResponse https://t.co/SHjOLrsrc7

#Ag producers are eligible for the #EIDL program under the coronavirus relief bill being considered in Congress. EIDL will provide relief for FL farmers but there is more to be done. I'll cont. to work w/ my colleagues & the Admin to assist FL producers during this pandemic. https://t.co/WrjyjgmmcX
We’re stronger together. #Taiwan again going above and beyond to promote global health security. https://t.co/Shr2L25YQS @HouseForeignGOP #coronavirus

Grateful to #SouthKorea in demonstrating the strength of our alliance. I hope we can continue to engage with similar goodwill moving forward for burden-sharing negotiations. #Covid19 #testkits #USROKAlliance #WeAreInThisTogether

Happy to cosponsor HR 6386 with @RepMattGaetz. Assistance money meant for the American taxpayer should not end up in the hands of #PRC who are responsible for the initial global spread of #coronavirus. @HouseForeignGOP @HouseGOP

God Bless our medical professionals today and every day for their selfless work battling the #coronavirus. Your tireless work is saving lives and America is grateful. #WorldHealthDay2020 https://t.co/blpri8KtFJ

In 2015 @BillGates spoke on the exact situation we are facing now.  Americans must do what we have always done lead during times of crisis.   Our investment in treatments & vaccines will benefit all of humanity.  #coronavirus #COVIDー19   https://t.co/cxoUY45v33

Here's what #China & the #CCP have been pedaling during the #coronoavirus crisis.  🚫Expulsion of international journalists 🚫Faulty medical equipment 🚫Debunked conspiracy theories 🚫Falsified COVID-19 case numbers  All this to win a "propaganda battle." What we need is #truth.
#China could have been honest when #coronavirus first hit #Wuhan.   They were not.  A lesson for all nations: never trust information from an authoritarian state. https://t.co/WAnsAGnYMu
Feeling like I’m beating a dead horse here...  More evidence that #CCP #China has lied about #coronavirus.  Again I’m not surprised.   https://t.co/BFx4jWyZzY

We need to stop our reliance on countries like #China for our medical supplies. A national stockpile of medical equipment is needed now!  Proud to partner with @SenRickScott by introducing this bill in the House along w/ @RepDarrenSoto.  #Covid_19  https://t.co/T1tPXs4G89

This article by @HK_FreePress is shocking.  We should be encouraging discussion during the #coronavirus pandemic not shutting it down. #WHO bowing to #Beijing is the exact opposite of what the world needs right now.  #Covid_19 #China  https://t.co/8zD4eIuwfw
Not surprised.  #china #PRC #Covid_19 https://t.co/mkpgukV1I0

Thank you @RepMcCaul for championing this effort.  The world deserves to know what #China did and refused to do as #COVIDー19 spread within their country and across the globe.  @HouseForeignGOP https://t.co/Dglqyg5DGI
My team has compiled resources on #Coronavirus. Stay informed stay safe.  Federal information ➡️ https://t.co/nEuWtOUxPM  State/local information ➡️ https://t.co/pPt3sjSpoB

An important takeaway on the #PRC's #Coronavirus cover-up from this @ForeignPolicy piece - "...an effort to distract attention from accusations that [#China's] initial cover-up is responsible for the rest of the world’s plight in particular the looming economic catastrophe." https://t.co/K2c001DNNM
Always get a good return policy when it comes to #China’s “politics of generosity. https://t.co/rSwHnuEIcE #coronavirus

Great to see that @realDonaldTrump has granted the Major Disaster Declaration requested by @GovRonDeSantis and @FLSERT for Florida.   This will bring more resources to our state during this fight against #coronavirus. https://t.co/rRmCH8m3c3

Any #coronavirus relief deal must support our nation’s farmers & ranchers who like many other industries face unique challenges during this time. Our nation’s #agriculture industry can't be left behind. @USDA   @HouseAgGOP https://t.co/rR98DUXYc5
Companies at #UF's Sid Martin Biotech Incubator are researching ways to counter #Coronavirus. The work being done will help the US and the world defeat this virus.   https://t.co/I036pQ8XbZ
Couldn’t have put it better myself @AmbJohnBolton.   That is why I’m working on a bill with my House colleagues to ensure this never happens again.  #COVIDー19 #China https://t.co/HpKtLyLq9w

Due to the #coronavirus the US Embassy in Mexico announced the suspension of visas beginning today (3/18/20). The embassy said they will continue to process H2 visas for returning workers. #agriculture

It is a natural move for the #US to work closely with #Taiwan on #COVID19. All the more reason our ally must be allowed to fully participate in the #WorldHealthOrganization.   #China #CCP #coronavirus https://t.co/8bLW8B5Poe
Great information on the #COVID19 situation in Florida from @HealthyFla and @GovRonDeSantis.   https://t.co/xo6OjNLmbT
Great article here on how effective we can be at flattening the #COVIDー19 infection curve. https://t.co/dwWqpNVdub

Funny how this comes out after #XiJinping got blamed for hiding the outbreak of #coronavirus in his country for over a month & silencing the scientists working on the disease allowing it to spread to over 80000 in #China along with over 12000 cases in 76 countries worldwide.

Unbelievable that China’s govt is supporting conspiracy claims that the U.S. is the real source of #coronavirus & is concealing the true extent of the spread within our country.  https://t.co/iamJMNRlGF @HouseGOP @HouseForeignGOP
So far #China has reported over 72000 cases of #coronavirus while #Taiwan reports just over 20. But the @WHO classifies both as “very high risk” by lumping them together as one country.

Today I joined my colleagues in expressing concern over Taiwan’s exclusion from the @icao. Given the rapid spread of #coronavirus in #Asia it’s unacceptable our friends in #Taiwan are shut out of talks that directly impact the safety of their citizens. https://t.co/WAWvBT1Vol

#Taiwan has proven its capability & determination on the global stage to contribute to disease prevention efforts time & again & Taiwan deserves the opportunity to participate in the international health arena. https://t.co/zqZLrZOimk @HouseForeignGOP @WHO #coronavirus #China

Important news: The @WHO has declared the novel #coronavirus update to be a public health emergency. This is the sixth time such an emergency has been announced. The overall health risk to the American public remains low. https://t.co/wHVYds1K2C
The #coronavirus has claimed the lives of over 100 people in #China & there are thousands of confirmed cases across Asia in addition to multiple cases in the United States. #coronavirus

#China has quarantined the city of #Wuhan (pop. of 11M) after 300+ reported cases & 6 deaths from a new #coronavirus. China bears responsibility for mishandling the containment & underreporting the spread of this outbreak. https://t.co/eLh2SnhUii
